Jackson has a motorcycle business that he has had for the past six years and has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him service his motorbike.

He hopes to expand his transport business.

loans.use: to service his motorbike

loans.name: Ma. Eva

texts.en:
Ma. Eva is 29 years old and married with one child.

Ma. Eva works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Ma. Eva borrowed and paid back seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from buying and selling beauty products.

Ma. Eva aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of the family.

loans.use: to buy additioanl stock to sell

loans.name: Alicia Digna

texts.es:
Alicia es una mujer de 69 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona alegre, trabajadora y muy fuerte. alicia es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en Huaca que se encuentra a 15 minutos de San Gabriel en la Provincia del Carchi.

Alicia trabaja sola en la crianza de cerdos, es el quinto crédito que realiza a Fodemi, el mismo que será invertido en la reconstrucción de los corrales de sus animales debido a que estan en mal estado y para que sus animales crezcan en buenas condiciones tienen que estar en corrales en buen estado. Inversión que le permitirá que sus animales crezcan con salud y sean optimos al momento de la venta.

Alicia sueña con mejorar la calidad de vida y que su hijo sea un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Alicia is a 69 year old lady. She is characterized as a happy, hardworking and strong person. She lives with her child in Huaca which is located 15 minutes from San Gabriel in the province of Carchi.

Alicia works alone raising pigs. This is her fifth loan through Fodemi. She will invest in the reconstruction of the pigpens for her animals because they are in bad shape and in order for her animals to grow under good conditions they have to be in pigpens that are in good condition. This investment will allow the animals to grow healthy and to be at their best at the moment of sale.

Alicia dreams of improving the quality of life and that her child becomes a good professional.

loans.use: to rebuild the pigpens that are deteriorated

loans.name: Veronica Jesus

texts.es:
Verónica, una mujer de 45 años está empeñada y decidida a salir adelante tras cualquier adversidad, ella y su esposo se dedican a trabajar diariamente para poder mejorar continuamente su calidad de vida, para lograr esto su esposo es albañil y ella se dedica a la venta de cervezas y gaseosas, actividad que le permite generar los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante.

Verónica es una mujer que disfruta mucho leer y como buena peruana reconoce y disfruta de los platillos nacionales, principalmente el “Arroz con Pato”, ya que es su favorito. Como no todo es entretenimiento, ella tiene una pequeña tienda donde sólo se dedica a la venta de las distintas cervezas que se venden en el país, también vende todo tipo de gaseosas, Verónica se dedica a esta actividad durante 6 horas aproximadamente y tiene buena afluencia de clientes. Sabe que su negocio tiene éxito porque le pone mucho empeño y dedicación a la atención de sus clientes y es rápida al atender a sus clientes.

Ella no sólo se dedica a este trabajo si no que también es profesora y esto le ha permitido desarrollarse profesionalmente. Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva ella podrá llenarse de productos y comprarlos a un precio más barato, lo mismo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos. Su sueño es poder tener una tienda grande y bonita para que luego con ayuda de sus ingresos pueda inaugurar su tienda en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
45-year-old Verónica is a committed woman who is determined to get ahead in life no matter what setbacks she faces.  She and her husband work every day in order to continually improve their quality of life.  Her husband works as a builder and she sells beer and soda.  This business allows her to make the income she needs to get ahead in life.

Verónica is a woman who really enjoys reading and, like all good Peruvians, she appreciates and enjoys our national dishes, particularly 'Arroz con Pato' (rice and duck), which is her favorite.  As life is not all entertainment, she has a small store where she sells different beers which are sold in our country.  She also sells all kinds of soda.  She works in this business for approximately 6 hours a day and has a good number of customers.  She knows the reason that her business is successful is because she puts a lot of effort and commitment into serving her customers and she is quick at it.  

Verónica not only works in this business but is also a teacher and this has allowed her to make progress professionally.  With the help of Kiva lenders, she will be able to stock up with products and buy them at a lower price.  This will enable her to improve her income.  Verónica's dream is to own a larger, more attractive store and then, with the help of her income, to open her store in the city center.

loans.use: to buy beer and soda wholesale

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is 37 years old and married with 4 children. She works hard to provide for her family.

Divina runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from selling ready-to-wear clothes. 

Divina requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store. She has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. Divina aspires to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is 46 years old and is from Naivasha. She is married to John and they have one son who is 14 years old.

Eunice has a boutique that she has been running. She has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy more clothes to add to her stock for sale. She hopes to open up a big boutique in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm seedlings and add stock of flour, rice and sugar to her shop

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 39-year-old motorcycle (boda boda) operator in Voi. He is married. Charles has been ferrying people using his motorcycle for the past five years. He is doing great.

This is Charles’ fourth business loan from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase a new motorcycle. He will use the anticipated profits to buy a refrigerator to start a juice selling business. He hopes to excel in business.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is 42 years old and is from Nakuru. She is married to Michael. They have four children who are between 5 and 20 years old.

Eunice has a business selling vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, and green peppers. She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to add stock to her business.

She hopes to expand her business and open and sell from a new stall instead of from a wheelbarrow.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, onions, and green peppers

loans.name: Abiar

texts.en:
Abiar is a 30-year-old married woman with no children. She has a business of selling food from a stall in Bor, South Sudan for four years.

Abiar is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sugar for sale

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children and all her children go to school. She also takes care of an additional family member. 

Eva owns a retail shop. She has been in business for the last three years. She works six days a week. She has requested for loan of 1,500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of sugar, boxes of soap, cartons of salt and jerycans of cooking oil. She generates additional business by selling charcoal. Her major business challenges are transportation, increasing prices of commodities and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to educate her children to the university level and also to own a fully stocked shop. 

She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity, but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap and cooking oil

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a 53-year-old business lady. She is married to David, a businessman. They are blessed with four children. She has been running a retail shop for the past four years with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her third loan term with KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Janet will use the loan to buy stock of sugar and rice for her shop. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy stock of sugar and rice for her shop

loans.name: Tonis Astul

texts.es:
Tonis, es agricultor, vive con su familia, su madre y dos sobrinos de 9 y 11 años de edad, él se dedica a sembrar maíz y frijol, aprendió el trabajo desde muy joven, el cual le agrado esta actividad como para seguirla desarrollando a lo largo de su vida.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una maquina desgranadora de maíz, este préstamo le permitirá realizar una buena inversión, que la facilita su trabajo en la agricultura a futuro, para procesar el maíz.
Su aspiración es tener mejorar sus producciones de maíz, para poder mantener a su familia la alimentación y sentirse satisfecho con su labor.
texts.en:
Tonis, a farmer, lives with his family, his mother and two nephews of 9 and 11 years old. He works growing corn and beans. He learned the work when very young and he likes this activity and has been developing it throughout his life.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy a corn sheller machine. This loan will permit him to make a good investment that facilitates his work in agriculture in the future, in order to process the corn.

His aim is to improve his production of corn, in order to be able to feed his family and to feel satisfied with his work.

loans.use: to buy a corn sheller machine

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
María, vive con sus tres hijos de 15, 12, y 3 años de edad, es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, este surgió por la necesidad de tener ingresos para su familia, ya que ella sola trabaja, el horario es de 5:00am a 6:00pm, realizando las ventas todos los días.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 3 sacos de maíz y 2 carretas de leña, esto le permitirá cubrir la demanda de los clientes, ya que a diario atiende a más personas.
El objetivo de María es sacar adelante a sus hijos, en los estudios y tener efectivo para cubrir cualquier necesidad imprevista.
texts.en:
María lives with her three children who are 15, 12 and 3 years old.  She is a single mother and her business is selling tortillas.  She set up her business because she needed to make income for her family as she is the only one who works.  She works from 5.00am to 6.00pm and makes her sales every day.

María is currently requesting a loan to buy three sacks of corn and two cartloads of firewood.  This will allow her to respond to her customer demand as she serves more and more people every day.

María's goal is to get her children ahead in life and help them make progress in their studies.  She would also like to have cash available to cover any unforeseen circumstances.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of corn and two cartloads of firewood

loans.name: Patmos Plus Group

texts.en:
Annie is the chairwoman of a community bank named “Patmos Plus”, which is made up of 20 members firmly united to receive loans from the MFI (micro-finance institution) HOPE DRC in order to develop their businesses.

Annie sells palm oil and seeds of corn. She sells in a market located in the northeastern part of Kinshasa. She has been in business since 1998. She already borrowed two loans from the MFI HOPE DRC for business expansion and fully repaid both loans. With the next loan, Annie will be able to meet the customer demand and generate additional profits. Her business makes US$30 of profit per week. One of Annie’s strategies to keep her clients is that she tells them in advance about any changes that can occur in business. Her ambition is to become a provider in her environment. Annie is 37 years old, divorced and has four children aged between 13 and 23 years old. Two of them attend school.

loans.use: to increase the inventory of her business by buying more palm oil and seeds of corn to resell at profit

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Yar

texts.en:
Yar is a 28-year-old married woman with no children. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for four years.

Yar is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Maria Yaneth

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos, su casa es propia, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales y tortillas, este negocio tiene ya 5 años de existir, realiza las ventas en el mercado municipal, todos los días de la semana.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña, maíz, cal, entre otros; con estos insumos tendrá la capacidad para aumentar la producción de las tortillas.
El objetivo de María al iniciar el trabajo con préstamos, es que su negocio se vea beneficiado, mejorando la capacidad para generar más ventas.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children, in her own house. She works selling tamales and tortillas. The business has existed for 5 years. She sells in the town market every day of the week.

Currently she is asking for a loan in order to buy wood, corn, lime and other items. With these supplies she will have the ability to increase the production of tortillas.

María’s objective is to begin working through loans, as her business could benefit by improving the ability to generate more sales.

loans.use: to buy wood, corn, lime and other items for resale

loans.name: Dalmecia

texts.es: La socia Dalmecia, continua con su negocio de elaboracion de  collares, elaboradas con semillas naturales. La socia sigue trabajndo con empeño para sacar adelante a su familia y darles mejor calidad de vida, la socia tiene un pedido muy importante y desea confeccionar mil collares con pepas naturales de frutos y con listones, para ello la socia invertira el prestamo en la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de los collares.
texts.en:
Dalmecia continues with her business of making necklaces, making them from natural seeds. 

The member continues working with commitment to bring up her family and give them a better quality of life. 

The member has a very important order and wants to make a thousand necklaces with natural seeds from fruit and with ribbons, and because of this the member will invest the loan in the purchase of materials for making the necklaces.

loans.use: to buy materials to make necklaces

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 30 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona amigable, solidaria, responsable y muy trabajadora. María es soltera, vive con su madre en San Gabriel en la Provincia del Carchí.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de animales (cerdos), es el segundo crédito que realiza a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de balanceado para la alimentación de sus cerdos ya que necesita engordarles porque se acercan ferias y quiere vender para obtener mejores ingresos que mejoraran su calidad de vida y podrá cubrir las necesidades de ella y de su mamá.

Su sueño es poder costruir su propia casa y aumentar la cantidad de cerdos.
texts.en:
María is a 30 year old woman who is known for being friendly, supportive, responsable, and very hard-working.  María is single, and she lives with her mother in San Gabriel in the Carchí Province.

María works alone raising animals (pigs).  This is her second loan with Fodemi.  She will use the loan to buy balanced feed for her pigs.  She needs to fatten them because the fairs are coming up.  She wants to sell them and get better income to improve her quality of life and to be able to cover her expenses and her mother’s expenses.

Her dream is to be able to build her own house and to increase the number of pigs that she has.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals because she needs to fatten them to sell.

loans.name: Teo

texts.en:
Teo lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children and all her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees, paying utility bills and rent.

Teo operates a retail shop in a location that she rents. She has been in this business for the last 7 years. She works 7 days a week. She has requested a loan of 600,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of sugar, rice, flour and cooking oil. Her major business challenges are transportation, seasonality and thieves. Her aspirations and goals are to own a wholesale shop and get enough profits to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, rice, flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Ding

texts.en: Ding is a 29-year-old married woman with no children. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for 4 years. Ding is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 50-year-old beauty salon owner in Mombasa. She is married and has been running her business successfully for the past two years.

This marks her second loan from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to purchase new blow dryers, hair tongs, and hair rollers. 

She will use the anticipated profits to repay her loan and purchase a piece of land to construct rental houses. She hopes to have a more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase new blow dryers, hair tongs, and hair rollers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy textiles and threads.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.es: El socio Rosalio, continua brindando el servioc de taxi y el sigue a cargo de sus unidad como chofer; el socio es taxista independientey el socio cada 4 meses le hace el mantenimiento respectivo a sus unidad vehicular, el socio requiere el prestamo en esta ocasión pra cubrir los gastos de la revision y mantenimiento de us unidad vehicular.
texts.en: Rosalio continues to operate his taxi service and continues to drive his own vehicle. He is an independent taxi driver, and every four months he has his vehicle serviced. He requests a loan at this time to cover the costs of inspecting and servicing his vehicle.

loans.use: to cover the costs of inspecting and servicing his vehicle.

loans.name: Blanca Lilian

texts.es:
Blanca, administra una tienda de productos domésticos, es madre de tres hijos de 17, 19 y 22 años de edad, el negocio lo tiene instalado en la vivienda, surgió por la necesidad de tener ingresos, tiene ya 4 años de tenerlo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de la canasta básica, para fortalecer el negocio, surtiéndolo de arroz, frijoles, avena, huevos, gaseosas, leche en polvo, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el inventario y ofrecerle a los clientes productos de calidad.
El objetivo de Blanca es trabajar con el préstamo para hacer crecer el negocio, ya que esto le generara mayor venta y atender a los clientes de mejor manera.
texts.en:
Blanca is the mother of three children, aged seventeen, nineteen, and twenty-two, and runs a store that sells products used in the home. The business, which is located in her home, began as a result of the necessity to earn income. She has had it for four years.
She is requesting the current loan to purchase staple products such as rice, beans, oats, eggs, soda pop, and powdered milk, thereby strengthening her business, as well as helping her to improve her inventory and to offer her customers quality products. Blanca’s goal is to work with the loan to grow her business, especially since this will help her to generate greater sales and provide for her customers in the best way possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, oats, eggs, soda pop, and powdered milk.

loans.name: Tatul

texts.en:
Tatul was born in 1982 in Sevkar village, Tavush region. After serving in the Armenian army, he graduated from Yerevan State University Ijevan branch, where he learned psychology and pedagogy. Tatul couldn’t find appropriate work in his specialty and now he works as a driver. He is married and has two small sons. Tatul's parents also live with them.

Simultaneously with his regular work, Tatul and his family are engaged in farming. On their farm they breed cows, pigs, hens and turkeys. Also, they have a hothouse and garden where Tatul grows fruits and vegetables. He has a plot of land where he grows wheat. Tatul and his family use part of their agricultural products for their own needs, and reminder they sell to support the family. 

Tatul is asking for a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy a tractor which will allow him to hasten his field operations, such as sowing and harvesting.

loans.use: to buy a tractor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a stock of maize cereal for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a 22-year-old lady from Kisumu City. She is married to a businessman, George, and they have two children, aged two and three years.

Lydia operates a book-selling business in the heart of Kisumu City. She has been in this business for the last six years and makes a monthly income of KES 10,000.

She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use buy new books and second-hand textbooks for secondary school. She will use her profits to educate her children. Her dream is to have a big bookshop.

loans.use: To buy secondary school textbooks.

loans.name: Abigael

texts.en:
Abigael is a 40-year-old lady from the Manyatta estate of Kisumu City. She is married to John and they have two children.

Abigael sells textiles and shawls. She has been in this business for one year, making a monthly income of KES 20,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy textiles and materials used for dressmaking. 

Abigael will use her profits to expand her business. Her dream is to open a boutique where she can sell her goods.

loans.use: to buy textiles and materials used for dressmaking.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is a 26-year-old man from the Corner Legio area of Kisumu City. He is married to Caroline, and they have two children, aged one and two years.

Bernard operates a butchery. He has been in this business for the last three years, making a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy meat to sell.

He will use his profits to educate his children. His dream is to have many butchery outlets within Kisumu City.

loans.use: to buy fresh meat for the butcher shop.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: Pedro Pablo tiene 43 años de edad, el tiene su negocio que es la venta de leña y carbón, el recibe el apoyo de su esposa que es maestra de una escuela de la comunidad donde habitan. Juntos han sacado a sus hijos adelante con mucho esfuerzos. Pedro Pablo está solicitando financiamiento para su vivienda lo cual construirá un anexo para la vivienda, el comprara con el crédito cemento, hierro, arena entre otros materiales de construcción.
texts.en: Pedro Pablo is 43 years old. He has a business selling wood and charcoal. He has the support of his wife who is a teacher in a school in the community where they live. Together, they have worked hard to bring-up their children. Pedro Pablo is requesting a loan to build an addition to his home. He will use the loan to buy cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has one child. 

Emmanuel is providing motorela (a motorcycle encased in a carriage with two rows of seats facing each other) or motorcycle services. He has had this business for two years. He requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

Emmanuel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, he hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

loans.name: Esmeralda Yaneth

texts.es:
Esmeralda, vive con su familia, es madre de dos hijos de 12 y 16 años de edad, ella tiene una tortillería y vende pupusas, este negocio lo tiene en la casa de habitación, no hay un horario específico para atender, pues todo depende de la clientela, tiene ya 5 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, frijoles, quesillo, chicharrón, condimentes, harina, aceite, todos estos materiales los podrá obtener por medio del préstamo, que será una gran ayuda para Esmeralda y para el funcionamiento del negocio.
La aspiración de ella es en un futuro ampliar la vivienda, de las ganancias del negocio, para vivir más cómodamente.
texts.en:
Esmeralda lives with her family, and has two children, aged twelve and sixteen. She has a tortillería and sells pupusas [stuffed tortillas]. Her business is located in the house where she lives. She has no fixed working hours since everything depends on customer demand, and has been working this way for five years.
She is currently requesting a loan to purchase corn, beans, quesillo [tortillas stuffed with cream cheese], chicharrón [pork skins], condiments, flour, and oil. She will be able to obtain all these products through the loan, which will be of great help to Esmeralda and for her business’ functioning. Her aspiration is to use her business earnings to increase the size of her house someday in the future, so she may live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, quesillo [tortillas stuffed with cream cheese], chicharrón [pork skins], condiments, flour, and oil.

loans.name: Jose Wilian

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 15 y 10 años de edad, él se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, lleva ya 10 años en este oficio, trabajando junto con su esposa y de este negocio han logrado vivir por un buen tiempo, cubriendo sus necesidades básicas.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para complementar el valor de una motocicleta, que utilizara para repartir pan, con esta compra que le permitirá hacer el dinero del préstamo, José va a poder distribuir con más facilidad y a más zonas el pan.
La aspiración de José es prosperar con el negocio, contribuir al desarrollo de su familia y seguir contando con la ayuda de financiamientos para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children, who are 15 and 10 years old.  He makes and sells bread for a living.  He has been in this trade for 10 years, working together with his wife.  This is the business that has allowed them to live for a while now, as it covers their basic needs.

He is asking for this loan to cover the cost of a motorcycle that he will use to deliver bread.  With this purchase, which the loan will allow him to make, José will be able to deliver bread more easily and to more areas.

José's aspiration is to make his business thrive, to contribute to his family's development, and to keep counting on help from financing to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his bakery

loans.name: Maria Gilma

texts.es:
María, vive con sus hijos en casa familiar, se dedica a la compra y venta de una fruta llamada tamarindo, tiene el negocio desde hace 15 años, sus hijos le ayudan a preparar la venta, ella se traslada a varios pueblos a ofrecer a los clientes.
Actualmente María está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tamarindo, ya que está saliendo el fruto, y puede obtenerlo a menor precio, además tendrá la disponibilidad de dinero para el pago de transporte hacia dónde va a vender el producto. 
El objetivo de María es tener siempre disponible el Tamarindo para salir a vender, ya que vive de los ingresos que le ocasiona esta venta.
texts.en:
María lives in her own house with her children.  She is a tamarind merchant; she’s had the business for 15 years.  Her children help her prepare the merchandise for sale.  She goes to various towns to sell to her customers.

Currently, María is asking for a loan to buy tamarind since this fruit is about to be harvested and she can get it at a better price; besides she’ll have money available to pay the cost of transportation to the places where she goes to sell it.

María’s objective is to always have tamarind available to go out to sell because she lives off the income these sales generates.

loans.use: to buy tamarind.

loans.name: Karla Maria

texts.es: Karla Maria 29 años de edad, es una emprendedora que inicio su negocio de venta de mercadería en general que con mucho esfuerzo y con fondos propios, ya que ella quería apoyar a su esposo en los gastos de la familia, y poder sacar a sus hijos a delante juntos. Karla está solicitando financiamiento para comprar variedad de ropa, sandalias, camisas de varón y de mujer, y variedad de cosméticos.
texts.en: Karla María, 29, is an entrepreneur who started her own business selling general merchandise with much effort and with her own funds because she wanted to help her husband with household expenses and support their children together.  Karla is asking for financing to buy a variety of clothes, sandals, men's and women's shirts and assorted cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes, sandals, men's and women's shirts and assorted cosmetics.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 31 years old and from Nakuru. She is married to George and they have three children in Primary School.

Judith has a food stall where she sells bananas. She has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy more bananas to add to her stock.

She hopes to expand her business and open a bigger stall.

loans.use: to buy more bananas for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 42-year-old married man with 3 children, 2 of whom attend school while the other is still too young for school. He lives in a rental house with electricity but no piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food for his family and school fees for his children. 

Joseph has operated as a taxi driver for the past 6 years; his potential clients are local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of owning another taxi in the future.

With the 40,000 KES, he wants to purchase blocks, sand and cement for building his home. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to improve his living standards and build a permanent home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase blocks, sand and cement for building his home

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a married man with 1 child who is enrolled in school. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family. 

Mohammed has operated a motorcycle transportation business for the past 2 years, operating from home to the market. His potential clients are the local area residents. Mohammed faces a major challenge of competition from other motorbike transport operators. He dreams of expanding his business.

Mohammed plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to start up a retail shop for his wife by purchasing stocks of wheat and maize flour, rice and sugar. He decided to join Yehu to access capital to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to start up a retail shop for his wife by purchasing stocks of wheat and maize flour, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Rosa Lili

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus dos hijos, se dedica a la venta de pan, este oficio inicio por la necesidad de tener ingresos para la subsistencia de su familia, trabaja desde hace 3 años y hasta la fecha no ha tenido inconvenientes y a sus hijos no les ha faltado lo más necesario.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de Pan, ya que el negocio consiste en que distribuye o vende en las zonas cercanas el pan de una panadería, a quien le compra el pan todos los días para salir a la reventa.
Este préstamo le ayudara para mantener el dinero y realizar las comprar periódicas de pan y así mantenerse en el negocio. Ella quiere sacar a sus hijos adelante, pues su sueño es verlos desarrollados.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her two children; she’s a bread merchant.  This occupation arose because she needed to earn income to support her family.  She has been in business three years and to date has had no problems and her children have had the basics.

She’s asking for a loan to buy bread since her business consists in distributing or selling in areas near a bakery that she buys bread from every day to resell.

This loan will help her keep money and be able to make periodic bread purchases to stay in business.  She wants to move her children forward for her dream is to see them developed.

loans.use: to buy bread to sell.

loans.name: Mirna Guadalupe

texts.es:
Mirna, vive con su esposo y su hija de un año de edad, administra una tienda de consumo, su horario es de 6:00am a 7:00pm, este surgió por iniciativa propia, con la intensión de generar ingresos para su hogar, los materiales que ofrece son como aceite, arroz, embutidos entre otros.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de más mercadería como harinas, refrescos artificiales, huevos, pollo, con esta inversión ayudara a proveer más y mejores productos a los clientes, tambien generara mayor ventas para apoyar a su familia con los ingresos.
Ella quiere ir creciendo, con la ayuda de los prestamos espera que si se pueda, además de facilitar para su hija los ingresos para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Mirna lives with her husband and one-year-old daughter.  She runs a grocery store.  Her schedule is 6am to 7pm.  It arose by her own initiative aiming at generating household income.  The products she offers are oil, rice, cured meats, among others.

She is currently asking for a loan to buy more merchandise like flour, soft-drinks, eggs and chicken.  This investment will help her provide more and better products for her customers.  It will also generate higher sales to support her family with the income.

She wants to continue growing and hopes that will help from the loans she’ll be able to do so in addition to earning income for her daughter’s development.

loans.use: to buy flour, soft-drinks, eggs and chicken.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, solamente él trabaja en la casa, sembrando maíz y frijol, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre cuando aún estaba soltero, trababa en tierras alquiladas, no tiene  un horario fijo.
Él comprara insumos para preparar la tierra, por eso solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, con ellos estará dispuesto a iniciar las labores agrícolas de la temporada, esta compra será muy buena para Raúl.
La aspiración de Raúl es tener un negocio agrícola mejor, con las cosechas abundantes para saciar las necesidades de su familia y al mismo tiempo proveer para los clientes.
texts.en:
Raúl is a farmer.  He lives with his wife and three children; he’s the only one who works planting corn and beans, an occupation he learned from his father when he was still single.  He works on leased lands and he does not have a fixed schedule.

He will buy supplies to prepare the soil so is asking for a loan to buy manure and herbicides to be ready to start the seasonal farming tasks.  This purchase will be very good for Raúl.

Raúl's hope is to have a better farming business with abundant harvest to meet his family’s needs while at the same time providing for his customers.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, se dedica a la venta de atol, vive en casa familiar con sus hijos de 7 y 10 años de edad, ella se dedica a este negocio por la necesidad de tener una ocupación que le genere ingresos para las necesidades de sus hijos, su horario es de 6:00am á 10:00am.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leche, harina, canela, azúcar, para la elaboración de atol, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio y con los materiales para seguir adelante.
La aspiración de Elizabeth es crear un buen historial de crédito, para que con este apoyo pueda crecer con sus ventas y así mejorar su apoyo a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth sells atol for a living.  She lives in the family home with her children, who are seven and ten years old.  She does this work for a living because she needs to have an occupation that makes money for her children's needs.  Her schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 10 a.m.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn, milk, flour, cinnamon, and sugar to make atol.  This investment will help her improve availability in her business and with these ingredients she will be able to get ahead.

Elizabeth's aspiration is to establish a good credit history so that she will be able to use this help to increase her sales and improve her ability to support her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, milk, flour, cinnamon, and sugar

loans.name: Wilgean

texts.en:
Wilgean is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Wilgean has a shop that sells clothing like t-shirts & blouses. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy clothing like shirts & blouses to sell.
Wilgean has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Wilgean hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing like shirts & blouses to sell

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward paid back his previous loan well and in good time.The business is doing great

This is Edward’s second business loan from KADET LTD . He plans to open a retail shop business, he will use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and educate his children. He hopes to have a happier family.

loans.use: to add stock of sugar, cooking oil, maize flour and wheat flour for his retail store and to buy a dust board for his motorcycle transport business.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 43 years old from Olkalou and is married with three children who are in primary school.

Richard has a motorcycle business that he has been doing for the past two years. He has applied for a loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy another motorbike to help in the business.

He hopes to own many more motorcycles and see his business expand.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Raffy

texts.en:
Raffy  is 22 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 1 child. 
Raffy  is providing motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 3 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for the services.
Raffy  has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Raffy hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for his mortorcycle transport service

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 
Julieta has a shop that sells frozen meat fish in a variety of fish. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy frozen meat fish to sell.
Julieta has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Julieta hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy frozen meat fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay school fees.

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es:
Mauricio, vive con su madre, su esposa, y dos hijos, la ocupación de Mauricio es la crianza de cerdos, este oficio y negocio lo aprendió para manejar un ingreso para su familia, no tiene un horario establecido, ya que la granja está ubicada en la casa de habitación. 
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, este préstamo le dará los recursos para poder obtener los cerdos y aumentar la granja.
El objetivo de Mauricio es tener éxito en el negocio, engordar los cerdos y comercializarlos a buen precio, proveyendo así más ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
Mauricio lives with his mother, his wife and his two children.  He raises pigs, an occupation and business he learned in order to earn family income.  He does not have a fixed work schedule since the farm is located at home.

He’s asking for a loan to buy pigs and feed concentrate for them.  This loan will give him the necessary resources to obtain pigs and to increase his herd size.

Mauricio’s goal is to have a successful business, to fatten up the pigs and to sell them at a good price thus providing more income for the family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus hijos de 20 y 12 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, atiende un puesto en el mercado municipal desde las 11:00am, hasta que logra vender todas las tortillas.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, gas, leña, para la elaboración de la venta de tortillas, este préstamo le servirá para mejora la disponibilidad de los materiales necesarios para continuar en el negocio.
La aspiración de Rosa es seguir en el negocio, para llevar el sustento a sus hijos, y cubrir los gastos y servicios del hogar.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her children who are 20 and 12 years old.  She sells tortillas.  She tends to a stand in the municipal market from 11am until she sells out all the tortillas.

She’s asking for the loan to buy corn, gas and firewood to make tortillas to sell.  This loan will help her improve supplies of necessary ingredients to continue in business.

Rosa’s hope is to stay in business to provide sustenance for her children and to cover expenses and household utilities costs.

loans.use: to buy corn, gas and firewood.

loans.name: Alma Iris

texts.es:
Alma, se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes, vive con sus tres hijas y su madre, una de sus hijas es enfermera, las otras están estudiando, Alma se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes, dicho negocio está instalado en el mercado municipal, lleva 10 años en el negocio, lo aprendió de sus padres.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, jugos, gatorade, para surtir el negocio, esta compra le ayudara para incrementar el negocio y mejorar la atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Alma es fortalecer el negocio, brindarle mayor seguridad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Alma sells refreshing beverages.  She lives with her three daughters and her mother.  One of her daughters is a nurse and the others are attending school.  Alma sells refreshing beverages in the municipal market; she’s been in business ten years having learned it from her parents.

She is asking for a loan to buy soft-drinks, juice and Gatorade to stock the business.  This purchase will help her increase business and improve customer service.  Her goal is to strengthen the business and provide better economic security to her family.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, juice and Gatorade.

loans.name: Leonor Isabel

texts.es:
Leonor, vive con sus dos hijos, ya están adultos, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y enchape, desde hace 5 años trabaja en este negocio, ya tiene clientes bien definidos, con este negocio se mantiene cubriendo los gastos necesarios.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de joyas enchapadas como aretes, anillos, cadenas, para surtir el negocio y así tener mayor variedad para los clientes, manteniendo la preferencia de los clientes.
Ella quiere tener una buena experiencia con este préstamo, esperando que pueda pagar bien y que su negocio sea cada vez más prospero.
texts.en:
Leonor lives with her two adult children.  She sells cosmetics and plated jewelry.  She has been doing this work for five years and she now has well established customer.  She lives off of this business, as it covers her necessary expenses.

She is asking for a loan to buy plated jewelry, such as earrings, rings, and chains, to stock her business, have a wider variety for her customers, and keep her customers' preference on hand.

She wants to have a good experience with this loan and hopes to be able to make her payments and that her business will thrive more and more.

loans.use: to buy plated earrings, rings, and chains

loans.name: Maria Stella

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de verduras, tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos los cuales están estudiando, ella administra una tienda de verdura fresca, tambien cría cerdos para vender, dichos negocios los tiene en su casa de habitación, esto le permite atender la clientela de la zona, ya que vive fuera de la ciudad.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en verdura: papas, güisquiles, yuca, zanahorias, entre otras que son necesarias para ofrecer a los clientes, con este préstamo lograra realizar una buena compra que le estabilice el negocio y le genere mejores ventas.
Ella quiere crecer y espera realizarlo a través del préstamo, mejorando su condición económica y el apoyo a su familia.
texts.en:
María sells vegetables.  She is 43 years old, and she lives with her husband and their two children.  The children go to school.  She runs a fresh vegetable store, and she also raises pigs to sell.  She has these businesses at her house.  This allows her to tend to the clientele in the area because she lives outside of the city.

She is requesting a loan to invest in vegetables like potatoes, chayote, yucca, carrots, and others that she needs to offer her customers.  With this loan she will manage to make a good purchase that will stabilize her business and generate better sales for her.

She wants to grow, and she hopes to do so through the loan.  She will be improving her financial situation and the support of her family.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, chayote, yucca, and carrots.

loans.name: Eveliza

texts.en:
Eveliza is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Eveliza has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Eveliza has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Mary Grace has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Mary Grace has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Mary Grace hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Judith has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Judith has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Judith hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Ephantus

texts.en:
Ephantus is 37 years old business man, he is married to Jane a farmer. They are blessed with three children. He has been running a retail shop for the past four years with the monthly income of KES 15,000 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his fourth loan term with KADET LTD , after repaying the previous loan successfully. Ephantus will use the loan to buy a stock of sugar and rice for his shop. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy a stock of sugar and rice for his shop
